name: World War II
description: Key events, figures, and battles of World War II.

flashcards.question: What event sparked World War II?
What was the Holocaust?
flashcards.answer: The genocide of six million Jews

flashcards.question: When did World War II end?
What was the Manhattan Project?
flashcards.answer: The project to develop the atomic bomb

flashcards.question: Who was the leader of Nazi Germany?
Who was the British Prime Minister?
What was the Battle of Stalingrad?
flashcards.answer: A significant turning point in favor of the Allies on the Eastern Front
